meanings.sent1: The intraocularly surgery helped improve his vision.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the intraocularly procedure to the patient.
meanings.sent3: The tiny intraocularly camera captured amazing images of the eye.
meanings.sent4: Her love for art was like an intraocularly light illuminating her soul.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was as mesmerizing as an intraocularly view of the eye.

meanings.definition: Administered or occurring within the eye.
meanings.sent1: The medication was delivered intraocularly to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: The intraocularly injection was painless and quick.
meanings.sent3: The clown's joke about eye drops being intraocularly administered made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an intraocularly administered truth piercing through the lies.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the rainbow were as vibrant as an intraocularly administered dye in the eye.
